attributes.action: Stop HM Prison at Morton Hall, Swinderby, Lincolnshire being turned into an immigration detention centre for asylum seekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A prison near Lincoln could be turned into an immigration detention centre for asylum seekers, under new prison reforms.

Changes are about to be made at HMP Morton Hall, Swinderby, Lincolnshire.  A proposal includes turning the all-female prison, which holds just under 400 inmates, into an immigration detention centre.

This type of facility would hold foreign nationals waiting for decisions on asylum claims and those waiting for deportation, following a failed application.

Please help to stop this from happening.

The change of Morton Hall as something that should not be considered.
